trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to control access to directory objects without direct manipulation of Access Control Lists (ACLs).
trans-unit.target: 提供無需直接管理存取控制清單 (ACL)，即可控制對目錄物件之存取的功能。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The security descriptor to be associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 與新 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件建立關聯的安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> class with the specified security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的安全性描述元 (Security Descriptor)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The identity to which the access rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 要套用存取規則的識別。

trans-unit.source: It must be an object that can be cast as a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是可以轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The access mask of this rule.
trans-unit.target: 這個規則的存取遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
trans-unit.target: 存取遮罩是 32 位元的匿名位元集合，其意義由個別的積分器所定義。

trans-unit.source: true if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個規則繼承自父容器則為 true。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the inheritance properties of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定存取規則的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether inherited access rules are automatically propagated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否自動傳播繼承的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The propagation flags are ignored if <c>inheritanceFlags</c> is set to <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inheritanceFlags</c> 設為 <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.None" />，則忽略傳播旗標。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the valid access control type.
trans-unit.target: 指定有效的存取控制類型。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of objects to which the new access rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 要套用新存取規則之物件類別的識別。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of child objects which can inherit the new access rule.
trans-unit.target: 可繼承新存取規則之子物件類別的識別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule" /> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule" /> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法建立的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified access rule to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的存取規則加入與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯的 Discretionary 存取控制清單 (DACL)。

trans-unit.source: Adding an access rule might cause existing access rules in the DACL to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 加入存取規則可能會導致現有的存取規則要合併的 DACL。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified audit rule to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的稽核規則加入與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯的系統存取控制清單 (SACL)。

trans-unit.source: Adding an audit rule might cause existing audit rules in the SACL to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 加入稽核規則可能會導致現有的稽核規則要合併的 SACL。

trans-unit.source: The identity to which the audit rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 要套用稽核規則的識別。

trans-unit.source: It must be an object that can be cast as a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是可以轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The access mask of this rule.
trans-unit.target: 這個規則的存取遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
trans-unit.target: 存取遮罩是 32 位元的匿名位元集合，其意義由個別的積分器所定義。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />，如果這個規則繼承自父容器。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the inheritance properties of the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定稽核規則的繼承屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether inherited audit rules are automatically propagated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否自動傳播繼承的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The propagation flags are ignored if <c>inheritanceFlags</c> is set to <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inheritanceFlags</c> 設為 <see cref="F:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.None" />，則忽略傳播旗標。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the conditions for which the rule is audited.
trans-unit.target: 指定規則的稽核條件。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of objects to which the new audit rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 要套用新稽核規則之物件類別的識別。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of child objects which can inherit the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 可繼承新稽核規則之子物件類別的識別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule" /> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule" /> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法建立的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include access rules explicitly set for the object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包括為物件明確設定的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include inherited access rules.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包括繼承的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The security identifier for which to retrieve access rules.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取存取規則的安全識別項。

trans-unit.source: This must be an object that can be cast as a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是可轉型為 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the access rules associated with the specified security identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之安全識別項相關聯的存取規則集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of access rules associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 物件相關聯的存取規則集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include audit rules explicitly set for the object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包括為物件明確設定的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include inherited audit rules.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包括繼承的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The security identifier for which to retrieve audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取稽核規則的安全識別項。

trans-unit.source: This must be an object that can be cast as a <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是可轉型為 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the audit rules associated with the specified security identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之安全識別項相關聯的稽核規則集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of audit rules associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 與指定之 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 物件相關聯的稽核規則集合。

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply to the DACL.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 DACL 的修改。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功修改 DACL，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的修改套用至與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件關聯的判別存取控制清單 (DACL)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功修改 DACL，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The modification to apply to the SACL.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 SACL 的修改。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功修改 SACL，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified modification to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的修改套用至與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件關聯的系統存取控制清單 (SACL)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SACL is successfully modified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功修改 SACL，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes access rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯的 Discretionary 存取控制清單 (DACL)，移除包含與指定存取規則相同安全識別項和存取遮罩的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the access rule was successfully removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功移除存取規則，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Access removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add access control rules in addition to removing them.
trans-unit.target: 存取被透過使用複雜的演算法，可能會加入存取控制規則，除了移除它們。

trans-unit.source: This method fails to remove the access rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the access rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法移除此存取規則，並傳回`false`如果相關聯的存取規則的繼承規則，才能成功移除演算法太複雜。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that have the same security identifier as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯的 Discretionary 存取控制清單 (DACL)，移除包含與指定存取規則相同安全識別項的所有存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that exactly match the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯的 Discretionary 存取控制清單 (DACL)，移除與指定存取規則完全相符的所有存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes audit rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯的系統存取控制清單 (SACL)，移除包含與指定稽核規則相同安全識別項和存取遮罩的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the audit rule was successfully removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功移除稽核規則，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Audit removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add audit control rules in addition to removing them.
trans-unit.target: 稽核移除被透過使用複雜的演算法，可能會加入稽核控制規則，除了移除它們。

trans-unit.source: This method fails to remove the audit rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the audit rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除稽核規則失敗，並傳回`false`如果稽核規則相關聯的繼承規則，才能成功移除演算法太複雜。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that have the same security identifier as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯的系統存取控制清單 (SACL)，移除包含與指定稽核規則相同安全識別項的所有稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that exactly match the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯的系統存取控制清單 (SACL)，移除與指定稽核規則完全相符的所有稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to reset.
trans-unit.target: 要重設的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object and then adds the specified access rule.
trans-unit.target: 移除與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯之 Discretionary 存取控制清單 (DACL) 中的所有存取規則，然後加入指定的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified access rule in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object and then adds the specified access rule.
trans-unit.target: 從與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯之 Discretionary 存取控制清單 (DACL)，移除包含與指定存取規則相同安全識別項和限定詞的所有存取規則，然後加入指定的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的稽核規則。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified audit rule in the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> object and then adds the specified audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 從與這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectoryObjectSecurity" /> 物件相關聯之系統存取控制清單 (SACL)，移除包含與指定稽核規則相同安全識別項和限定詞的所有稽核規則，然後加入指定的稽核規則。
